text: In this study, we report the case of a Moroccan consanguineous family with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and sudden cardiac deaths at an early age; our patient was a 7-month-old Moroccan girl. Whole exome sequencing identified the deleterious homozygous mutation c.236_246delCCACACAGTGC (p.Pro79ArgfsX13) of GAA gene leading to a post-mortem diagnosis of Pompe disease.
